item.title: By: Judith
item.dc:creator: Judith
item.description: <p>The Galleries of Justice is great Matt & I did that whilst in Nottingham, not to mention a variety of pubs along our stay. I can also suggested the Caves of Nottingham in the centre of the city.</p>
